org.openntf.domino.ext

Interface DateTime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<DateTime>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DateTime
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DateTime

    public interface DateTime
extends Comparable<DateTime>
    Author:
    nfreeman OpenNTF extensions to DateTime class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(DateTime compareDate)
      Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether they are the same.
      boolean equalsIgnoreDate(DateTime compareDate)
      Compares two DateTimes to see if they are the same time (including millisecond), ignoring date element
      boolean equalsIgnoreTime(DateTime compareDate)
      Compares two DateTimes to see if they are the same date, ignoring the time element
      boolean isAfter(DateTime compareDate)
      Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether current date is after parameter.
      boolean isAnyDate()
      Checks whether the DateTime is defined as any date, so just a specific Time
      boolean isAnyTime()
      Checks whether the DateTime is defined as any time, so just a specific Date
      boolean isBefore(DateTime compareDate)
      Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether current date is before parameter.
      void setLocalTime(com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar calendar)
      Sets the date and time to the value of a specific Java Calendar instance
      com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar toJavaCal()
      Returns a Java Calendar object for the DateTime object, same as used internally by org.openntf.domino.DateTime class

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        boolean equals(DateTime compareDate)
        Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether they are the same.
        Parameters:
        comparDate - DateTime to compare to current date
        Returns:
        boolean, whether or not the two dates are the same
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • equalsIgnoreDate

        boolean equalsIgnoreDate(DateTime compareDate)
        Compares two DateTimes to see if they are the same time (including millisecond), ignoring date element
        Parameters:
        comparDate - DateTime to compare to the current DateTime
        Returns:
        boolean true if time is the same
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • equalsIgnoreTime

        boolean equalsIgnoreTime(DateTime compareDate)
        Compares two DateTimes to see if they are the same date, ignoring the time element
        Parameters:
        comparDate - DateTime to compare to the current DateTime
        Returns:
        boolean true if date is the same
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • isAfter

        boolean isAfter(DateTime compareDate)
        Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether current date is after parameter.
        Parameters:
        comparDate - DateTime to compare to current date
        Returns:
        boolean, whether or not current date is after the parameter
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • isAnyTime

        boolean isAnyTime()
        Checks whether the DateTime is defined as any time, so just a specific Date
        Returns:
        boolean, whether the DateTime is a date-only value (e.g. [1/1/2013])
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • isAnyDate

        boolean isAnyDate()
        Checks whether the DateTime is defined as any date, so just a specific Time
        Returns:
        boolean, whether the DateTime is a time-only value (e.g. [1:00 PM])
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • isBefore

        boolean isBefore(DateTime compareDate)
        Compares current date with another and returns boolean of whether current date is before parameter.
        Parameters:
        comparDate - DateTime to compare to current date
        Returns:
        boolean, whether or not current date is before the parameter
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • toJavaCal

        com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar toJavaCal()
        Returns a Java Calendar object for the DateTime object, same as used internally by org.openntf.domino.DateTime class
        Returns:
        Java Calendar object representing the DateTime object
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

      • setLocalTime

        void setLocalTime(com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar calendar)
        Sets the date and time to the value of a specific Java Calendar instance
        Parameters:
        calendar - Java calendar instance with relevant date and time
        Since:
        org.openntf.domino 1.0.0
